overview:
Mike founded YOLLEGE, Inc. in August of 2007.

Prior to YOLLEGE, Mike was Founder and President of University Passport. UP was a premier college touring company that offered college bound students and their parents all inclusive day trips to colleges throughout California. While running this company, Mike developed the idea to create a site that would allow college students to voice their opinions on various issues pertaining to their school. During the transition period from UP, Mike reunited with former UC Davis lacrosse teammate ,Dan Greenberg, to build YOLLEGE.
